wikipedia_page.main: Juanita Casey (10 October 1925 – 24 October 2012) was a poet, playwright, novelist and artist as well as a horse and zebra trainer and breeder. Her writing celebrates her time in Ireland and the New Forest.

link_mentions.page: List of biographical dictionaries of women writers in English
